attributes.title: Bad quality
attributes.review:
This app doesn‚Äôt do what it advertises. I was expecting Satan to greet me when I first opened the app but was let down when all I saw was his side kick hell spawn Donald J Trump. I found the rights propaganda to be unentertaining and frankly whinny. The lack of patriotism was astounding as well. Patriotism should be doing what‚Äôs best for everyone, not wearing a bikini with the flag printed on it. 

Finally, I don‚Äôt trust this app alone with my teenage daughter. In short, if I could give this a -5 star review I would. It‚Äôs dividing and destroying our country. 

Would not recommend.

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: As a young person preparing for this years 2020 election I have decided to brush up on the candidates in order to make a well informed decision. NOT ONLY did this app provide NOTHING but it was biased, intellectually off-putting, and poorly designed. After a day of using it I noticed it was omitting a high frequency whenever I used it WHICH CAUSED MY GRANDMOTHER TO HAVE A SEIZURE!!! I cannot believe a sitting president would put his own citizens and supporters at risk in this way. Apple should immediately remove this app to prevent anymore tragedies from happening ever again.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review:
I ain‚Äôt a part of this gen z thing but I wanted to review this app. First it kept kicking me outta the app. And it kept asking for my age and my parents name. It said please put in your state and address. it‚Äôs not a safe app guys. It asked me for credit card info and other stuff like my email, Phone number, ext. 
But even tho I put in my phone number all I got was spams from the app for random products that no one would ever use. I tried to cancel the spam but after I renters my number it didn‚Äôt stop. I rate this one star.

attributes.title: Lag Issues
attributes.review: So, I was extremely excited to be able to get the app on my phone after my son told me about and to get it so I am updated on what our wonderful President is doing. However, I have been having many issues with the app. One of these includes Lag as so my son told me. So, I don‚Äôt know if I should delete the app or not. I am only rating this app 1 Star not the President. The app seems like this issue needs to be fixed. Please fix this. I have tried to reinstall  but it does not work.

attributes.title: I felt personally attacked
attributes.review: I like to call myself in the middle of these to parties. and I was open to seeing how Trump will try to improve the United States. But after downloading this app I understand white America is the way it is right now. I felt personally attacked every click they wanted more money. It felt like I was just a wallet for using this app. The more I looked at it the more I realized that I don‚Äôt even align with his ideals. And those ideals are just human rights. this app is a clear indication of why the United States is failing right now.

attributes.title: really bad

attributes.title: Trump App
attributes.review: So number 1 I want to say that for whoever is saying that he's NOT racist, homophobic and mysoganistic. you are incorrect, get your fricking facts right and stop being so blinded by your privilege. To the person who said were all little kids under twelve who have nothing better to do, actually im not under 12, i have so many better things i could be doing but im choosing to sit here and write this review to educate the adults who are so brainwashed that they cant see who this cheeto is. And also, my parents are very proud of me‚ù§Ô∏è

attributes.title: THE APP KILLED MY BROTHER AND TOOK MY HOT CHEETOü§≠
attributes.review: This app took 2 years to download and once I downloaded it trump popped out of the screen and started to eat all the snacks in my house. It was all fine until he ate my hot Cheetos then I went crazy. I started running around at hitting him with a giant glow stick. He was so scared that he peed himself and then went into the corner and started crying. Then his evil twin poped out of the app and started  walking towards my brother. Then the twin used his mind powers to through my brother out the window. So all in all this app killed my brother.
